# DMRID Lookup ðŸ“¡

A lightweight command-line tool to lookup DMR IDs for amateur radio callsigns using [radioid.net](https://www.radioid.net/).

## Features

- ðŸ”Ž Lookup one or more callsigns
- ðŸ“‹ Pretty table output with `--pretty`
- ðŸ“‚ Save results to CSV with `--save filename.csv`

## Installation

```bash
pip install dmrid-lookup
